title: Launch Button makes the sound and only shows the EULA after 6.3 can't launch the client. Help Please

embed.description: Hi guys, So I was having the same issue and I managed to fix it. Here how I've done that : **Step 1** : - Go to "**C:\Riot Games\League of...

body:
Tried everything in the link. 
Turned off my anti virus and firewall. 
Set me screen resolution low. 
Done a full re-install three times. 

Riot... S.O.S.

replies.body: Also tried to repair the install from launcher. Nothing is working for me.

Could you try a few things (one at a time) for me?

* [Change to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* Use the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** found in the top of your LoL folder
* Run the game as an admin by right clicking the shortcut and selecting "Run as Administrator"
* Use a VPN. I suggest [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/)
I tried the 1st 3 and no luck, will have to get around to trying the VPN.

I'm not sure how to fix it then. :l Try these [articles](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/categories/200137704) and if they don't help then contact Riot [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190). Good luck.
Just finished submitting a support ticket. So thankyou.
Have you tried restarting your modem/router?
Just tried that and it didn't help. Appreciate it though.
